blacklist_tip.message: Add a domain name to this list, then activate the blacklist by clicking on the switch at the top of this page. Proxy servers would be used only for entries from this list. Alternatively, you can use domain mask when you're adding a new entry. For example, example* will match all websites which starts with «example» (example.com, example.org).

prompt_footer.message: FireX Proxy opened this window due to security restrictions in Firefox. Additional permissions are needed to use your own proxies for all websites.

authentication_support_warning.message: Your browser does not support SOCKS proxy authentication. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience.
